DOC.HEADLINE: UNION ' S ENDING ? YOU KEEP THE GIFTS
DOC.TEXT: For all_of you whose impulse marriage was followed quickly by an impulse dissolution , here is today ' s social brain-scratcher : What do you do with all_the loot ? If people bring gifts to your hey-honey , let ' s-get-married wedding_ceremony , or if they send presents soon thereafter , what happens when the union ends unhappily ever after ? Etiquette guru Judith Martin ( also known as the author and syndicated columnist Miss Manners ) says , basically , once you ' re married , the stuff is yours . " I do , " in short , translates to " I keep " -- the gifts . But , Martin adds : " This is not to discourage anyone who may be gracious enough to return the gifts. " ELIZABETH MEHREN
